DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate effect enterolignanas flaxseed nutritional inflammatory indicator male worker food industry .
DOC.criteria: Work manufacture company city ItuSP . Have least three follow cardiovascular risk factor : waist circumference ≥ 90 cm ; overweight obese characterize BMI ≥ 25 kg/m² ; fast total cholesterol ≥ 200 mg/dL , LDL cholesterol ≥ 130 mg/dL HDLcholesterol < 40 mg/dL , triglycerides ≥ 150 mg/dL ; glycemia ≥100 mg/dL ; hypertension characterize systolic blood pressure ≥140 mm/Hg and/or diastolic blood pressure ≥ 90 mm/Hg .
